title: Request Signature on Repair Addendum
description: After negotiations, both parties have agreed on repairs. The TC must get the final repair addendum signed.

tasks.description: Draft the final repair addendum, listing the agreed-upon repair items.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new addendum is created listing the specific repairs the seller has agreed to make.

tasks.description: Send the addendum to the buyer for their signature, then route it to the seller for their signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document is sent through an e-signature platform in the correct signing order.

tasks.description: Once fully executed, upload the signed addendum to the transaction file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final, executed document is saved to the system.
